Geography.Climate: Maritime temperate, significant precipitation in all seasons

Historical_Eras.Roman_Period: Gallia Belgica, then part of Germania Inferior
Historical_Eras.Middle_Ages: Under Frankish Merovingian and Carolingian rule
Historical_Eras.Burgundian_and_Habsburg_Rule: Part of Burgundian Netherlands, then Austrian Netherlands

Modern_History.World_Wars: Violated neutrality in both wars, German occupation
Modern_History.Post_War_Era: Economic growth, Benelux formation, EU institutions in Brussels

Contemporary_Issues.Linguistic_Division: Between Dutch-speaking Flanders and French-speaking Wallonia
Contemporary_Issues.Economic_Division: Unequal development between Flanders and Wallonia
Contemporary_Issues.Political_Fragmentation: Increasingly fragmented landscape, long government formation periods

Contributions.European_Union: Founding member, Brussels as de facto EU capital
Contributions.Cultural_Influence: Known as the crossroads and battlefield of Europe
